changelog.change: Added Quitout splits (and "On quitout" variations to many existing splits).
Added an internal version converter (allowing you to safely open layout files from earlier versions of the autosplitter).
Fixed bonfire state-based splits ("On light" and kindling).
Ending splits now split on credits (rather than when the cutscene begins).
Game time now properly resets to zero when the timer is reset in-game.
